name: Evil Commit Messages
description: Generate dark humor commit messages that match Evil Clippy's personality
command: echo 'Commit with dark humor - use git commit -m "feat: [your evil message]"'
examples: feat: blood drips now sync with developer tears
fix: glitch effect no longer summons actual demons
refactor: extracted soul from monolithic component
perf: optimized horror - now 60fps of pure dread
docs: added warnings that nobody will read
